span.span: Represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), with comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示描述 XML 文档的规范格式的 C14N XML 规范化转换。The class represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform that describes the canonical form of an XML document. 此转换允许签名者创建使用 XML 文档的规范格式的摘要。This transform allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document. 然后，收件人可以验证 XML 文档的相同的规范格式使用相同的转换的数字签名。A recipient can then verify the digital signature using the same canonical form of the XML document with the same transform. 使用类在你需要注册包含注释的 XML 文档。Use the class when you need to sign an XML document that contains comments. 请注意，你不能直接创建规范化转换类的新实例。Note that you cannot directly create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class. 若要指定规范化转换，请将传递描述到转换的统一资源标识符 (URI)属性，它是可从访问属性。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要获取的规范化转换的引用，使用属性，它是可从访问属性。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 用于描述的 URI类定义由字段。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 用于描述的 URI类定义由字段和字段。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field and the field. 有关与注释 C14N 的详细信息转换，请参阅部分 6.5 和 6.6.1 XMLDSIG 规范中，可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)。For more information about the C14N with comments transform, see Sections 6.5 and 6.6.1 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. W3C 规范 XML 规范，位于 www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n 中定义的规范化算法。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n. ## Examples 的签名，然后验证该文件。This example creates a signature of www.microsoft.com in an XML file and then verifies the file. 第二个示例演示如何对 XML 文件使用封装签名进行签名。The second example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using
